DIV1.HEADING: Sample Event: Publication of Le Magasin des enfants

CHRONSTRUCT.CHRONPROSE: Jeanne Le Prince de Beaumont published Le Magasin des enfants, a collection containing a first influential and literary formulation of the popular fairy story Beauty and the Beast. 125-6

SHORTPROSE.P: The origins of this story lie in folk-tale and in the second-century text The Golden Ass by Apuleius. Its outlines are legible in several tales by Marie-Catherine d'Aulnoy. It became a drama by Stéphanie-Félicité de Genlis in 1785 and an opera by Marmontel and Grétry in 1788. 128-9
